amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance in contravention of the Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits use of State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance in contravention of the Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 (relating to establishment of sanctuary cities).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A084) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 198 (Roll no. 294).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A084) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 198 (Roll no. 294).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A084) offered by Mr. King (IA).
